Infectum.turoyo: naqla ko-midawdlo, naqla ḥniqo; w-ftiḥ fema
translations: ‘That moment she was swinging [on the rope] and then she was strangled [to death]; her mouth opened’; 773; 45/23

Part. Pass..turoyo: ga kal ko kito xanǧar b-u=šuro, i=ḥayye mdawdálto-yo eba 773; 61/134;
translations: da ist ein Dolch in der Wand, daran baumelt eine Schlange
